Corrigendum to Two problems concerning polynomials
H.  Daçenport and A,  Schinzel ( this Journal,  214 / 216,  386—391 )
It has been pointed out by M.  J.  Wonenburger in Math.  Reviews,  29 ( 1965 ), p.  18,  that the conclusion of the proof of Theorem 2 needs modification. 
The last complete paragraph on p.  390 should be omitted,  and throughout the rest of the proof Xg,  0,. . . , 0 should be replaced by. .. , x ^^ 0,. . . , 0. 
The assertion on p.  391 that а ( Жз, . . . , ÿj is a constant should be replaced by the assertion that it does not vanish identically,  this being justified by the fact that other wise / would not depend on x ^^
In the next formula,  ^( a ^ g,. . . , y ^) is now a rational function,  and after substitution in ( 22 ), ( 23 ) we have to use the same reasoning as earlier to remove a possible denominator. 
The statement about Ri ( Xi ^ x ^ should be deleted,  and the conclusion is that
/( д?  1, . .  * ^ Xj ) = F (^ R ^{ Xi ^ • • M ^ 3?  • • M
which gives the last formula of the paper. 
We take the opportunity of mentioning that a generalization of our Theorem 2 has since been given by Schinzel in Bull.  Acad.  Polon.  Sei.  ( Série Math. ), 11 ( 1963 ), 633—638. 
Eingegangen 17.  Febmar 1966
